Articles.Content:
Is Laythe the same world as Chronotrigger game?

See for yourself:

Laythe

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/w/images/9/94/TinyLaythe.png

Chronotrigger 1000 A.D

http://www.retroplayers.com.br/wp-content/uploads/2009/09/720px-Chrono_Trigger_1000_AD_Map.png

Both are archipelago worlds, with small landmasses surounded with oceans. I find it very eerie that even though Laythe has water and an atmosphere, it is a desolate place. Perhaps Laythe is what happens if Lavos won? Or perhaps it is waiting for kebals to colonize it...

I mean... idk.

Here's a flat map of Laythe.

Not really that close, imo.
I dont know about chronotrigger but,That meteor hole looks like kerbins meteor hole.

That meteor hole looks like kerbins meteor hole.

Does this mean Laythe is Kerbin?! :-o

Does this mean Laythe is Kerbin?! :-o

Too similar not to be

half-life 3 confirmed.
